## Behind the scenes

### Installation

- Dockerfile commands :
```dockerfile
RUN curl -fLo coursier https://git.io/coursier-cli && \
        chmod +x coursier

```

- APK packages (Linux):
  - [openjdk11](https://pkgs.alpinelinux.org/packages?branch=edge&name=openjdk11)
